code: From Undecidability.TM Require Import TM Util.TM_facts HoareLogic HoareRegister.

Lemma RealiseIntroAll sig F n X (P : forall _ _ _ _, Prop) (M : pTM sig F n): (forall x, M ⊨ (fun tin '(yout, tout) => P x tin yout tout)) -> M ⊨ (fun tin '(yout, tout) => forall (x:X), P x tin yout tout).
Lemma TerminatesInIntroEx sig n X (T : forall _ _ _, Prop) (M : TM sig n): (forall x, M ↓ (fun tin k => T x tin k)) -> M ↓ (fun tin k => exists (x:X), T x tin k).
